comment: Naming of Michelle O'Neill as Sinn Fein leader in NI means seven UK parties now have female leaders ( incl Eng / Wales Green Party )

            :ARG2 (p2 / person

amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (r / regard-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (p / political-party
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Sinn"
                              :op2 "Fein"))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / party
                        :mod (c / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "UK"))))
            :op2 (r2 / recommend-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (r3 / regard-01
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 p2)))
      :snt2 (r4 / refuse-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (t2 / take-01
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (s / seat
                        :poss t)
                  :location (c2 / city
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "London")))
            :ARG0-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / party
                        :polarity -
                        :mod c))))
